title: Bachelor of Science in Journalism and Emerging Media
description: The Media and Entertainment degree at KSU is designed to equip you for a dynamic career in the creative digital media industry. Through this program, you will acquire valuable skills such as podcasting, filmmaking, screenwriting, film and video production, and more. This degree will not only provide you with practical expertise but also challenge you to delve into the critical intersections of communication and media, exploring their profound impacts on our lives, society, and culture. With a focus on various media forms, including radio, film, television, print, and electronic media, this program offers a comprehensive understanding of the media landscape.
careers: Advertising Account Manager, Broadcast Journalist, Communications Manager, Content Writer, Digital Marketing
